name: Sweetest Thing
overview: Enjoy Sweetest Thing, a sugar-coated time management game! Ants have invaded Candy Land. The town square's chocolate fountain has run dry and gingerbread houses are starting to crumble. It’s time to call in a sugar repair engineer! Travel to Cupcake State, Chocolate Shire and Jelly City to rebuild a candy realm. Gather, fix and build. Isn't it sweet? Rebuild a lip-smacking world ravaged by ants Find hidden treats and earn all achievements Enjoy a candy-coated world
